Empty.description: Empty model. Used as default value when no model is specified.

operations.summary: Retrieve a list of countries/region and corresponding states/provinces.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a query.  Default profile name = IBM_countryStateList_Summary

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The country or region abbreviation code

responseMessages.message: Bad request. Some of the inputs provided to the request aren't valid.
Not authenticated. The user session isn't valid.
The user isn't authorized to perform the specified request.
Internal server error. Additional details will be contained on the server logs.

operations.summary: Retrieve the display name of a country and/or a state.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a query.  Default profile name = IBM_countryStateName

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The country or region abbreviation code

parameters.name: stateCode
parameters.description: The state or province abbreviation code.

responseMessages.message: Bad request. Some of the inputs provided to the request aren't valid.
Not authenticated. The user session isn't valid.
The user isn't authorized to perform the specified request.
Internal server error. Additional details will be contained on the server logs.

description: This class provides RESTful services to get countries or regions and states or provinces information.
